DOC.detailed_description: A prospective observational study conduct 13 Korean center enrol consecutive series 645 patient small paraclinoid unruptured intracranial aneurysm ( UIAs ) 2015 2017 . The investigator define cohort population adult ( 20 year old ) small ( less 5mm ) unruptured paraclinoid aneurysm . To determine growth rate risk factor , angiographic feature base MRA CTA ( ex ) size , arterial relationship , multiplicity ) clinical characteristic ( ex ) age , hypertension ( HTN ) , diabetes mellitus ( DM ) , Hyperlipidemia , smoking ) record initial visit , 1 year , 2years , 3years , 5years . The cumulative risk risk factor aneurysmal rupture growth analyse .
